amendment.description: To clarify the Secretary may use competitive research grant funds for certain requests for proposals.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2132 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2132 proposed by Senator Kohl for Senator Harkin. (consideration: CR S14142-14143; text: CR S14143) To clarify the Secretary may use competitive research grant funds for certain requests for proposals.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2132 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2132 proposed by Senator Kohl for Senator Harkin.
